properties.name: example-ranged-attack
properties.message: ◆ Strike - Weapon Name\nTo Hit: {1d20 + trained-proficiency + dexterity}\nDamage: {1d6 + strength} piercing

properties.name: example-melee-attack
properties.message: ◆ Strike - Weapon Name\nTo Hit: {1d20 + trained-proficiency + strength}\nDamage: {1d6 + strength} slashing

properties.name: example-spell-attack
example-spell-save
properties.message:
◆◆ Spell Name
Saving Throw - Basic Reflex DC {spell-dc}

Critical Success - probably nothing happens
Success - maybe something happens
Failure - good things happen
Critical Failure - amazing things happen

properties.name: spell-key-ability-modifier
properties.formula: (spell-key-ability-strength ? strength : (spell-key-ability-dexterity ? dexterity : (spell-key-ability-constitution ? constitution : (spell-key-ability-intelligence ? intelligence : (spell-key-ability-wisdom ? wisdom : (spell-key-ability-charisma ? charisma : 0))))))

properties.name: key-ability-modifier
properties.formula: (key-ability-strength ? strength : (key-ability-dexterity ? dexterity : (key-ability-constitution ? constitution : (key-ability-intelligence ? intelligence : (key-ability-wisdom ? wisdom : (key-ability-charisma ? charisma : 0))))))
